verses.verse: And Joseph <WH3130> was brought down <WH3381> to Egypt <WH4714>; and Potiphar <WH6318>, an officer <WH5631> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, captain <WH8269> of the guard <WH2876>, an Egyptian <WH376>, bought <WH7069> him of the hands <WH3027> of the Ishmeelites <WH3459>, which had brought him down there <WH3381>
And the Lord <WH3068> was with Joseph <WH3130>, and he was a prosperous <WH6743> man <WH376>; and he was in the house <WH1004> of his master <WH113> the Egyptian <WH4713>.
And his master <WH113> saw <WH7200> that the Lord <WH3068> was with him <WH3068>, and that the Lord made all that he did <WH6213> to prosper <WH6743> in his hand <WH3027>.

And Joseph <WH3130> found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in his sight <WH5869>, and he served <WH8334> him <WH6485>: and he made him overseer over his house <WH1004>, and all that he had <WH3426> he put <WH5414> into his hand <WH3027>.

And it came to pass from the time <WH227> that he had made him overseer <WH6485> in his house <WH1004>, and over all that he had <WH3426>, that the Lord <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> the Egyptian <WH4713>'s house <WH1004> for Joseph <WH3130>'s sake <WH1558>; and the blessing <WH1293> of the Lord <WH3068> was upon all that he had <WH3426> in the house <WH1004>, and in the field <WH7704>.

And he left <WH5800> all that he had in Joseph <WH3130>'s hand <WH3027>; and he knew <WH3045> not what <WH3972> he had <WH518>, save the bread <WH3899> which he did eat <WH398>. And Joseph <WH3130> was a goodly <WH8389> person <WH3303>, and well favored <WH4758>.
And it came to pass after <WH310> these things <WH1697>, that his master <WH113>'s wife <WH802> cast <WH5375> her eyes <WH5869> upon Joseph <WH3130>; and she said <WH559>, Lie with me <WH7901>.

But he refused <WH3985>, and said <WH559> unto his master <WH113>'s wife <WH802>, Behold <WH113>, my master knows <WH3045> not what is with me in the house <WH1004>, and he has committed <WH5414> all that he has <WH3426> to my hand <WH3027>;

There is none greater <WH1419> in this house <WH1004> than I <WH3808>; neither has he kept back <WH2820> any thing <WH3972> from me but you because <WH834> you <WH859> are his wife <WH802>: how then can I do <WH6213> this great <WH1419> wickedness <WH7451>, and sin <WH2398> against God <WH430>?
And it came to pass <WH1696>, as she spoke to Joseph <WH3130> day <WH3117> by day <WH3117>, that he listened <WH8085> not unto her <WH7901>, to lie by her <WH681>, or to be with her.

And it came to pass about this time <WH3117>, that Joseph went <WH935> into the house <WH1004> to do <WH6213> his business <WH4399>; and there was none of the men <WH376> of the house there inside <WH1004>

And she caught <WH8610> him by his garment <WH899>, saying <WH559>, Lie <WH7901> with me <WH5800>: and he left his garment <WH899> in her hand <WH3027>, and fled <WH5127>, and got <WH3318> him out <WH2351>.
And it came to pass <WH7200>, when she saw that he had left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> in her hand <WH3027>, and was fled <WH5127> forth <WH2351>,

That she called <WH7121> unto the men <WH582> of her house <WH1004>, and spoke <WH559> unto them <WH559>, saying, See <WH7200>, he has brought in <WH935> an Hebrew <WH376> unto us to mock <WH6711> us <WH935>; he came in unto me to lie <WH7901> with me <WH7121>, and I cried with a loud <WH1419> voice <WH6963>:

And it came to pass <WH8085>, when he heard that I lifted up <WH7311> my voice <WH6963> and cried <WH7121>, that he left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> with me <WH681>, and fled <WH5127>, and got him <WH3318> out <WH2351>.
And she laid up <WH3240> his garment <WH899> by her <WH681>, until his lord <WH113> came <WH935> home <WH1004>.

And she spoke <WH1696> unto him according to these words <WH1697>, saying <WH559>, The Hebrew <WH5680> servant <WH5650>, which you have brought <WH935> unto us <WH935>, came in unto me to mock me <WH6711>:
And it came to pass <WH7311>, as I lifted up my voice <WH6963> and cried <WH7121>, that he left <WH5800> his garment <WH899> with me <WH681>, and fled <WH5127> out <WH2351>.

And it came to pass <WH113>, when his master heard <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of his wife <WH802>, which she spoke <WH1696> unto him <WH559>, saying, After this manner <WH1697> did <WH6213> your servant <WH5650> to me <WH639>; that his anger was kindled <WH2734>.

And Joseph <WH3130>'s master <WH113> took <WH3947> him <WH5414>, and put him into the prison <WH1004>, a place <WH4725> where the king <WH4428>'s prisoners <WH615> were bound <WH631>: and he was there in the prison <WH1004>.
But the Lord <WH3068> was with Joseph <WH3130>, and shown <WH5186> him mercy <WH2617>, and gave <WH5414> him favor <WH2580> in the sight <WH5869> of the keeper <WH8269> of the prison <WH1004>.

And the keeper <WH8269> of the prison <WH1004> committed <WH5414> to Joseph <WH3130>'s hand <WH3027> all the prisoners <WH615> that were in the prison <WH1004>; and whatever they did <WH6213> there <WH6213>, he was the doer of it.

The keeper <WH8269> of the prison <WH1004> looked <WH7200> not to any thing <WH3972> that was under his hand <WH3027>; because the Lord <WH3068> was with him <WH6213>, and that which he did, the Lord <WH3068> made it to prosper <WH6743>.
